PackageOracle.name: DA_BILLING_PROD_INST_PRC
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BILLING_PROD_INST_PRC
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.41.910700000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,billing_price_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,price_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_prod_inst_prc_amt IN NUMBER
,blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_st_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_prod_dscnt_id IN NUMBER
,billing_prod_dscnt_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,billing_price_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_billing_prod_inst_prc;

body.name: DA_BILLING_PROD_INST_PRC
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BILLING_PROD_INST_PRC
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.41.921460000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,billing_price_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,price_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_prod_inst_prc_amt IN NUMBER
,blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_st_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_prod_dscnt_id IN NUMBER
,billing_prod_dscnt_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_inst_prc.add, parms=' || billing_prod_inst_id || '|' || billing_price_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || price_type_cd || '|' || billing_prod_inst_prc_amt || '|' || blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_st_dttm || '|' || blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_end_dttm || '|' || billing_prod_dscnt_id || '|' || billing_prod_dscnt_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_prod_inst_prc a
(
a.billing_prod_inst_id
,a.billing_price_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.price_type_cd
,a.billing_prod_inst_prc_amt
,a.blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_st_dttm
,a.blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_end_dttm
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_id
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.billing_prod_inst_id
,add.billing_price_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.price_type_cd
,add.billing_prod_inst_prc_amt
,add.blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_st_dttm
,add.blg_prod_inst_prc_vld_end_dttm
,add.billing_prod_dscnt_id
,add.billing_prod_dscnt_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_inst_prc.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,billing_price_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_inst_prc.del, parms=' || billing_prod_inst_id || '|' || billing_price_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_billing_prod_inst_prc a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.billing_prod_inst_id = del.billing_prod_inst_id
AND a.billing_price_cd = del.billing_price_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_inst_prc.del');

END del;

END da_billing_prod_inst_prc;
